puakma.addin.http
Class HTTPRequestManager

java.lang.Object
  puakma.addin.http.HTTPRequestManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorDetect, pmaThreadInterface
public class HTTPRequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements pmaThreadInterface, ErrorDetect

HTTPRequestManagers do several things:
1) wait for a GET or POST request from the client m_socket
2) processRequest()

HTTPRequestManagers are invoked as separate threads (one thread to a request) after being initialized by the HTTPServer at run-time Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes

isDataPosted

public boolean isDataPosted()
Allows others to determine if the user posted data to the server or not. Used by HTMLDocument.createDocumentItems() to determine if we should set the default values for fields or not.

Determines if the session has this role in the application if iType==0 we don't know what type of design element to look for, so just find the first match based on the name in actions, resources and pages.
